skills.title: HTML
skills.description: Proficient in using HTML to structure and organize web content, ensuring accessibility and compatibility across various browsers and devices.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: Skilled in CSS for designing visually appealing and responsive web layouts, with an emphasis on clean and maintainable code.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: Experienced in JavaScript for implementing dynamic and interactive features on websites, enhancing user engagement and functionality.

skills.title: React JS
skills.description: Adept at building modern, component-based web applications using React.js, with a focus on creating fast and seamless user interfaces.

portfolio.title: CV Maker
portfolio.description: A user-friendly solution for effortless resume creation. With this tool, individuals can input their personal information, educational history, and work experience, and then customize the layout and color scheme to match their unique preferences.

portfolio.title: E-commerce
portfolio.description: Making online shopping easy.Users can easily filter products by category, search for specific items, and add products to their cart. With the ability to adjust quantities and remove items, this project provides a seamless and user-friendly online shopping experience.

portfolio.title: Pokemon
portfolio.description: Initially, it displays 10 Pokémon cards for selection. Clicking on a specific Pokémon reveals a card with comprehensive details. The app also features 'Next' and 'Previous' buttons for easy navigation, allowing users to explore additional Pokémon in sets of 10.

testimonial.description: Muhammad Farhan is a React genius. Our site is now modern, functional, and beautiful. Great communicator too!
His React skills are top-notch. He delivered a fantastic website that wowed our users. Highly recommended!
He is a React pro. He made our website dynamic and user-friendly. Can't wait to work with him again!
